text: Total Dark Magic||This is the total amount of {{tr:icon_money}}Dark Magic available to your faction. Dark Magic can be generated via buildings, loot from winning battles, raiding and diplomacy.
The available {{tr:icon_treasury}}Dark Magic is displayed at the top of the screen on the campaign interface.

Dark Magic are unique - the life-force of the unliving, the more Dark Magic will be drawn to them. If the Winds of Dhar are shared between powerful Vampires and Necromancers, however, Dark Magic becomes more difficult to accumulate - their Undead legions requiring more energy to remain bound.
Use Warpstone[[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]]  for shits ang giggles PLACEHOLDER PH
Perform Great Rituals to empower your legions with temporary benefits
